commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: The School Idol Train will depart shortly. Please be seated as we prepare.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: This isn't good. I'm just repeating the same message over and over.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Isn't there anything else we can do?!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Maybe I should come up with a new performance...

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Heeeey! Everyone!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Honoka? What is it?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: They fixed the train!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We can depart whenever we want now.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: *Sigh* Thank goodness.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Yes, indeed.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: What a relief. I'm really glad.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Wait, this is no time to be relieved! We still have our live show!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: That's right. It's almost time!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: A live show on a train, huh? It truly is hard to imagine.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Our boxed lunches and announcements attracted a lot of attention. I wonder if we can do this.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: It doesn't matter. No matter what, our job is to put a smile on everyone's faces.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Come on, Nico-Nico-Ni! Everyone say it with me!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Nico... You're right.

commands.speaker: Honoka, Rina
commands.line: Nico-Nico-Ni!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'm feeling motivated. Let's try our best.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Is everyone ready? All right then, let's go!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Mari, what are you doing? That leads to the driver's seat.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: We have to go the other way.

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: We still have a little time before our live show starts, right? I'll drive the train until then.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: What?! Mari, this is a train! You know how to drive it?!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: Look, I even have my license!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: W-Wow. That's impressive, Mari.

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: Bzzt... Wait, that's not it. Mari, that's a driver's license for a car! Now stop messing around and get back here!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Wh-What?! I know how to drive a train, too, you know!

commands.speaker: Dia
commands.line: You too, Nico?! It's almost time for our live show, so cut it out, you two!

commands.speaker: Mari
commands.line: *Laugh* Are everyone's nerves gone? Let's keep this up and enjoy the live show!
